title: Video: Jackie Stabb – Stabb Session #1/#2
body:
Covering **Broken Social Scene** is never easy, unless of course you have the vocal talents of the beautiful **Chelsea Burgin,** in which case, it’s a piece of cake.

In these sessions Chelsea  aka **Jackie Stabb** takes on **Broken Social Scene’s** _Sweetest Thing_, as well as an original track titled _Going Nowhere_, which features alongside footage of a recent gig. As enticing and tantalizingly sensual as ever, it’s the perfect combination of a stunning image and equally as appealing music.

[Stabb Session #1 “Sweetest Kill” -Broken Social Scene, Cover- by, Jackie Stabb.](http://vimeo.com/52569325) from [Jackie Stabb](http://vimeo.com/jackiestabb) on [Vimeo](http://vimeo.com).
